text:
Alzheimer is a disease touching millions of citizisen around the world. It affects the brain cells which degenerated, causing a slow loss of memory.  Lots of research are undertaked around the world, and at the moment, there are no healing treatment, they try to slow down the degenerescence but they can not stop it, but there is hope.
The discovery of the probable mecanism of the disease : an accumalation of protein in the synapse of the cells, the tau protein and in the environment of the cells, there is the formation of amyloid plaques.
There is different prospects of treatment :
- Immunotherapy : Antibody of the the protein Tau and of the Beta amyloid which could stop the development of these plaque, and the degenerescence. This procedure is at a high rank of hope : the trials are going good. These treatment needs to be applicated in the begining of the disease, because it stops the propagation but, it is not restoring the lost cells.
-A Vaccine : kind of the same principe of the immunotherapy, with antibody against myeloid plaque, but there is a lot of side effetcs.
 It is really interesting to see all the mobilization of the research : scientist but also society (lots of donation), there is a lot of hope, and me, the first one, I feel really confident about the future of this disease, which at this moment is still unhealable.
A vaccine could be a fabulous way of prevention of these disease if it could be find, because people could be vaccine, and would never contract the disease that we can't threat..
For the immunotherapy, the patient needs to be take over fast and the disease needs to be diagnostic quickly since there is no recovery possible of the loss cell. SO this could be a good way, if the disease is already here, but it could be a brake because of the time of diagnosis..
